class.name: DBTable
class.description: The [GDDatabase] requires instances of this resource to represent tables. Directly using a [code]DBTable[/code] does not allow editing stored data, only query it. When a column is added into the table, it must be of a type identified by the code in [enum ValueType]. This "tells" the table which value types are meant to be stored.

method.name: get_cell_value
method.description: Retrieve the value stored in the cell at the column [param column_title] and row identified by [param row_id].

method.name: get_column_by_index
method.description: Given a column [param index], retrieve its information stored in a dictionary. The expected information is: - [code]title[/code] (String): The title of the column. - [code]value_type[/code] (int): The type of the values stored in the column. This is one from the [enum DBTable.ValueType]. - [code]extid[/code] (String): If not empty, the name of another table, referenced by values in this column. If the provided [param index] doesn't correspond to a valid column then an empty dictionary will be returned.

method.name: get_column_by_title
method.description: Given a column [param title], retrieve its information stored in a dictionary. The expected information is: - [code]title[/code] (String): The title of the column. - [code]value_type[/code] (int): The type of the values stored in the column. This is one from the [enum DBTable.ValueType]. - [code]extid[/code] (String): If not empty, the name of another table, referenced by values in this column. If the provided [param title] doesn't correspond to a valid column then an empty dictionary will be returned.

method.name: get_column_count
method.description: Returns the amount of columns in this table.

method.name: get_column_title
method.description: Given the column index [param column_index], retrieve its title.

method.name: get_column_value_type
method.description: Given a column index [param column_index], retrieve its value type.

method.name: get_data_as_json
method.description: Convert the stored data into [i]JSON[/i] format. Indentation can be controlled by the [param indent]. If you want to use the [b]TAB[/b] as indentation then set the parameter to [code]"\t"[/code].

method.name: get_id_type
method.description: Returns the row ID type of this table. It should be either [constant TYPE_INT] or [constant TYPE_STRING].

method.name: get_random_weight_column_title
method.description: If this table contains a column configured to handle [i]random weights[/i] (that is, a column of [constant VT_RandomWeight] value type), then this function retrieve its name, otherwise it will return an empty string.

method.name: get_reference_list
method.description: Returns a list of tables that are "referenced" by this one.

method.name: get_referenced_by_list
method.description: Returns a list of tables that references this one.

method.name: get_row
method.description: Given a row identified by [param row_id], retrieve all values of it. The returned dictionary should contain a key for each existing column in the table, matching the title. The value of that key is the corresponding stored [i]cell value[/i].

method.name: get_row_accumulated_weight
method.description: If this table contains a column configured to handle [i]random weights[/i] (that is, a column of [constant VT_RandomWeight] value type), then this function retrieves the accumulated weight of the row at [param row_index]. Otherwise this returns [code]0[/code].

method.name: get_row_by_index
method.description: Retrieve all values of a row, given its index [param row_index]. The returned dictionary should contain a key for each existing column in the table, matching the title. The value of that key is the corresponding stored [i]cell value[/i].

method.name: get_row_count
method.description: Returns the amount of rows stored in this table.

method.name: get_row_probability
method.description: Get the probability (in range [0..1]) of a row specified by [param row_index] being picked when calling [method pick_random_row].

method.name: get_table_id
method.description: When a table instance is created, an ID is generated. This is meant to properly verify certain internal data. This function returns said ID.

method.name: get_table_name
method.description: Retrieves the name of this table.

method.name: get_total_weight_sum
method.description: If this table contains a column configured to handle [i]random weights[/i] (that is, a column of [constant VT_RandomWeight] value type), then this function returns the total weigh sum.

method.name: has_column
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if [param title] corresponds to an existing column title in this table.

method.name: has_random_weight_column
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if this table contains a column configured to handle [i]random weights[/i] (that is, a column of [constant VT_RandomWeight] value type).

method.name: is_referenced_by
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] a different table named [param other_table_name] references this one. This function will only work if both tables were loaded by the owning [GDDatabase], otherwise the data will not be correctly set.

method.name: is_referencing
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if this table is referencing another table named [param other_table_name].

method.name: is_row_id_locked
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if this table has been created with a flag disallowing editing row IDs.

method.name: pick_random_row
method.description: Randomly select a row from the table and returns it. If there is a column configured to handle [i]random weights[/i] (that is, a column of [constant VT_RandomWeight] value type), then the weight system will be used. A [RandomNumberGenerator] can be provided through [param random_number_generator], providing more control over seed/state when requesting random rows.
